item.title: By: Bill-Hanson
item.dc:creator: Bill-Hanson
item.description: <p>I followed the article referenced above and everything worked as documented. I can add, remove and rename files, but I cannot edit any files. When I open a file in an editor via WebDAV, it is read-only. Has anyone ben able to edit files directly using WebDAV on a Domino server?</p>
item.content:encoded: I followed the article referenced above and everything worked as documented. I can add, remove and rename files, but I cannot edit any files. When I open a file in an editor via WebDAV, it is read-only. Has anyone ben able to edit files directly using WebDAV on a Domino server?
